episodes.title: Katy Morgan Davies - My life in a cult
episodes.description:
From the day she was born, Katy Morgan-Davies lived in a cult. Her father led the cult and subjected her and others within the cult to violence and mental abuse. She was not allowed to have any contact with anyone from the outside world, and on the rare occasions she did leave the house, she always had a chaperone. At age 30, she was able to leave.

I spoke to Katy about her time in the cult and also her views on antisemitism. 


Katy's book: https://www.amazon.co.uk/Girl-Shadows-My-Life-Cult-ebook/dp/B07KLLM3V8/ref=sr_1_1?crid=1M2K6WMATW09&dib=eyJ2IjoiMSJ9.i0RX80j_Ku-kE1ZST46BfEhJ-IvaxpQViVsmg9IfRbw.yUhZZ3h7Mxc9deNzeVrX9R8qToNxQQ4u7oyh8ry6vRg&dib_tag=se&keywords=katy+morgan+davies&qid=1752602246&s=books&sprefix=katy+morgan+davies%2Cstripbooks%2C70&sr=1-1

Find The 286 Project on Social Media: https://linktr.ee/the286project

episodes.title: Ex-Cult Member: My Dad's Rage
episodes.description:
In this preview, Katy Morgan-Davies discusses what would happen if she disobeyed the cult that she was part of from birth.

Watch the full interview on Tuesday, 15th July at 7pm BST!
